about_the_game:
The "Story of Nararale" is a 2.5D tactics turn-based game that focuses on tactical management. You take the role of a General who must command your troops to achieve victory.

Here are some key features of the game:

  • Choose and deploy your troops: Take charge of your troops and oversee their every move in order to defeat your enemies.
  • Individual Turn-Based: Control a character each turn, and every character has their own stats that can determine the turn order.
  • Attack Bar: Players must press the button at the precise moment to achieve optimal attack results. The more advanced the skill you choose, the more precise timing you need.
  • Manage your Actions: Every character has action points that refill every turn, and players need to manage their usage by choosing actions that suit their playstyle.
  • Directional Damage: The direction of an attack holds significance; if you are struck from behind, there is no way to evade it.
  • Fog of War: You can't see what's behind the fog and have to send troops to reveal the map, which changes your tactics every time you encounter enemies.
  • 2D Characters in a 3D World: Each character will be portrayed in 2D pixel art, existing within a 3D world that encompasses diverse terrains and multi-level maps.
